name: Untitled Gunship Game - Demo
description:
Follow this game's development on Twitter and Instagram @superbazookallc, or on my YouTube page!

This demo is a small taste of baseline gameplay. Modifiers and alternate modes coming soon!

Be the gunner of an AC-130 gunship and take out enemy bases with the 105mm howitzer. Use your 40mm autocannon to destroy light vehicles, or BRRRRRT your way across scores of troops with the 25mm gatling gun!
